title: Bluebeard ( 1944) John Carradine Crime, Horror, Thriller

sources.title: Bluebeard 1944 John Carradine Crime Horror Thriller
sources.description: Gaston; a Parisian artist and puppeteer has a secret life as Bluebeard a demented serial killer. He strangles beautiful young women who fail to meet his standards. Their bodies are disposed of in the streets of Paris. He is exposed when Lucille; his assistant reveals the awful truth.
